edit.title: Edit tender search
edit.companyDescriptionLabel: Which tenders do you want to search?
edit.companyDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe the tenders you're looking for and your company so AI knows what interests you...
edit.companyDescriptionTooltip: Describe your company, industry, and the type of services/products you offer. AI will use this information to pre-select tenders based on their titles.
edit.searchPhraseTooltip: Enter the main keywords that appear in the titles of tenders you're interested in. AI will use this information to search for tenders.
edit.selectedSources: Selected {count, plural, one {# source} other {# sources}}
edit.criterionQuestionPlaceholder: e.g. What is the contract value and how does it compare to our budget?
edit.emptyCriteriaError: You cannot create a search without criteria. Add at least one criterion.
edit.disqualifyingDescription: Failure to meet this criterion disqualifies the tender
edit.excludeFromScoreDescription: Do not include when calculating relevance
edit.instructionPlaceholder: e.g. 'Check the exact budget amount and consider the criterion met if the budget exceeds 500,000 PLN'
edit.instructionTooltip: Additional instructions for the AI clarifying how to analyze this criterion and when to deem it met.
edit.keywordsPlaceholder: Enter keywords separated by commas, e.g. 'certification, ISO, budget'
edit.keywordsTooltip: Enter keywords separated by commas, e.g. "certification, ISO, budget"
edit.assignInfo: Users selected below will have access to this analysis and its results. The analysis owner always has access.
edit.fetchError: Error fetching organization members. Please try again.
edit.saveError: Error saving user assignments. Please try again.

emailNotifications.title: Email Notifications
emailNotifications.description: Select who should receive emails about new tenders. By default, all assigned users receive notifications.

edit.filteringRulesPlaceholder: Enter custom instructions for filtering tenders...
edit.filteringRulesTooltip: Provide specific instructions to guide the AI in filtering tenders based on your requirements
edit.filteringRulesDescription: Optional: Add custom rules to help the AI better filter tenders according to your specific needs

create.title: Create new tender search
create.companyDescriptionLabel: Which tenders do you want to search?
create.companyDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe the tenders you're looking for and your company so AI knows what interests you...
create.companyDescriptionTooltip: Describe your company, industry, and the type of services/products you offer. AI will use this information to pre-select tenders based on their titles.
create.searchPhraseTooltip: Enter the main keywords that appear in the titles of tenders you're interested in. AI will use this information to search for tenders.
create.selectedSources: Selected {count, plural, one {# source} other {# sources}}
create.criterionQuestionPlaceholder: e.g. What is the contract value and how does it compare to our budget?
create.emptyCriteriaError: You cannot create a search without criteria. Add at least one criterion.
create.maxCriteriaError: You can add up to 20 criteria
create.instructionPlaceholder: e.g. 'Check the exact budget amount and consider the criterion met if the budget exceeds 500,000 PLN'
create.instructionTooltip: Additional instructions for the AI clarifying how to analyze this criterion and when to deem it met.
create.keywordsPlaceholder: Enter keywords separated by commas, e.g. 'certification, ISO, budget'
create.keywordsTooltip: Enter keywords separated by commas, e.g. "certification, ISO, budget"
create.filteringRulesPlaceholder: Enter custom instructions for filtering tenders...
create.filteringRulesTooltip: Provide specific instructions to guide the AI in filtering tenders based on your requirements
create.filteringRulesDescription: Optional: Add custom rules to help the AI better filter tenders according to your specific needs

comments.title: Comments
comments.noComments: No comments. Add the first one!

filters.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, number, organization, location...
filters.noTenders: No tenders matching the selected filtering criteria.

sidebar.limitMessage: You have reached the limit of {limit} active tender searches. To create a new search, delete one of the existing ones.

list.noTenders: No tenders matching the selected filtering criteria.
list.noResults: Analysis returned no results or tenders are still being analyzed. Visit this page later.
list.selectAnalysis: Select an analysis to see results.

actions.selectTenderToView: Select a tender to view details
actions.copySuccessDescription: Text has been copied to clipboard

board.selectCreateBoard: Select or create a board to get started
board.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this board?
board.confirmDelete: Are you sure? This action cannot be undone.
board.assignInfo: Users selected below will have access to this board and its contents. The board owner always has access.
board.errorAssigning: Error saving user assignments. Please try again.
board.changesRevertedOnRefresh: Changes will be reverted on the next refresh
board.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the board and all its columns and items.
board.deleteColumnConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this column and all its items?

tenders.noFilesDescription: This tender does not have any downloadable files. Check the tender source directly to access required documents.
tenders.noDescription: No description available. Files were not downloaded from the tender source.
tenders.noAnalysis: No criteria analysis available. Files were not downloaded from the tender source.
tenders.noCommentsError: Cannot load comments - missing tender identifier

products.title: Found Products
products.subtitle: Products matching your company profile
products.noProducts: No products found in this tender

singleAnalysis.title: Analyze single tender
singleAnalysis.urlHelper: Paste the link to the tender page from any supported platform
singleAnalysis.alreadyAnalyzing: This tender is already being analyzed
singleAnalysis.analysisError: An error occurred while analyzing the tender
singleAnalysis.analyzingInBackground: {count, plural, one {Analyzing # tender in background...} other {Analyzing # tenders in background...}}

errors.notFoundDescription: The requested tender was not found.

columns.cannotAddMaxReached: Cannot add criteria column: maximum number of visible columns reached ({max})
columns.clickToSort: Click to sort by criteria result
columns.noCriteriaAvailableDesc: No criteria defined in this analysis
columns.columnVisibilityDescription: Control column visibility and display options
columns.customizeDescription: Customize columns and data filters according to your needs
columns.dataFiltersControlDescription: Control which types of tender data are included in the analysis
columns.historicalDescription: Include tenders from past periods and archived data
columns.historicalNote: Historical data includes completed, expired and archived tender opportunities that may provide valuable context for analysis.
columns.filteredDescription: Include tenders filtered by preliminary selection
columns.filteredNote: The filtered tenders were automatically excluded based on the description and any user instructions
columns.externalDescription: Include tenders from external databases and partner sources
columns.externalNote: External sources provide additional tender opportunities from partner databases and external platforms.
columns.autoRefreshDescription: Changes to data filters will automatically refresh the tender list and update analysis results.
